metadata.dc:author: Bertomeu Martínez, Vicente
Soria Arcos, Federico
Morillas Blasco, Pedro
Mazón Ramos, Pilar
metadata.dc:description: The following article reviews some of the most recent data that have come to light in the field of hypertension during the last year, including the long lasting controversy USA/Europe on the definition and treatment of hypertension, the importance of the interrelationship hypertension/sleep apnea syndrome, to conclude by discussing some of the most compelling implications of the main trials that have been published during the last few months.
metadata.dc:title: Ultimas novedades en hipertensión arterial.
[Last developments on hypertension].
